trans-unit.source: The path to the NVIDIA CUDA compiler nvcc. Note that this path may not be the same as CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER. nvcc must be found to determine the CUDA Toolkit version as well as determining other features of the Toolkit. This variable is set for the convenience of modules that depend on this one.
trans-unit.target: NVIDIA CUDA编译器 nvcc 的路径。请注意，这条道路可能不会是相同的 CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER 。必须找到 nvcc 以确定CUDA Toolkit版本以及该工具包的其他功能。设置此变量是为了方便依赖此变量的模块。

trans-unit.source: The path to the directory containing the dot executable as reported in DOXYGEN_DOT_EXECUTABLE. The path may have forward slashes even on Windows and is not suitable for direct substitution into a Doxyfile.in template. If you need this value, get the IMPORTED_LOCATION property of the Doxygen::dot target and use get_filename_component() to extract the directory part of that path. You may also want to consider using file(TO_NATIVE_PATH) to prepare the path for a Doxygen configuration file.
trans-unit.target: DOXYGEN_DOT_EXECUTABLE 中报告的包含 dot 可执行文件的目录的路径。该路径甚至在Windows上也可能具有正斜杠，并且不适合直接替换为 Doxyfile.in 模板。如果需要此值，请获取 Doxygen::dot 目标的 IMPORTED_LOCATION 属性，然后使用 get_filename_component() 提取该路径的目录部分。您可能还需要考虑使用 file(TO_NATIVE_PATH) 为Doxygen配置文件准备路径。

trans-unit.source: The preprocessor definitions are added to the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS directory property for the current CMakeLists file. They are also added to the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS target property for each target in the current CMakeLists file.
trans-unit.target: 预处理程序定义将添加到当前 CMakeLists 文件的 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 目录属性中。它们也被添加到当前 CMakeLists 文件中每个目标的 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 目标属性中。

trans-unit.source: The presets are read before all other command line options. The options specified by the preset (variables, generator, etc.) can all be overridden by manually specifying them on the command line. For example, if the preset sets a variable called MYVAR to 1, but the user sets it to 2 with a -D argument, the value 2 is preferred.
trans-unit.target: 在读取所有其他命令行选项之前先读取预设。预设指定的选项（变量，生成器等）都可以通过在命令行上手动指定它们来覆盖。例如，如果预设将名为 MYVAR 的变量设置为 1 ，但是用户使用 -D 参数将其设置为 2 ，则首选值 2 。

trans-unit.source: The primary starting point for learning about CMake.
trans-unit.target: 学习CMake的主要出发点。

trans-unit.source: The primary task of a find module is to determine whether a package exists on the system, set the <PackageName>_FOUND variable to reflect this and provide any variables, macros and imported targets required to use the package. A find module is useful in cases where an upstream library does not provide a config file package.
trans-unit.target: 查找模块的主要任务是确定系统上是否存在软件包，设置 <PackageName>_FOUND 变量以反映此情况，并提供使用该软件包所需的任何变量，宏和导入的目标。在上游库不提供配置文件包的情况下，查找模块很有用。

trans-unit.source: The program in <FileName> will be found in the system search path or left as a full path. If PROGRAM_ARGS is present with PROGRAM, then any command-line arguments present in the <FileName> string are split from the program name and stored in <arg_var>. This is used to separate a program name from its arguments in a command line string.
trans-unit.target: <FileName> 中的程序将在系统搜索路径中找到，或保留为完整路径。如果 PROGRAM 带有 PROGRAM_ARGS ，则 <FileName> 字符串中存在的任何命令行参数都将从程序名称中分离出来并存储在 <arg_var> 中。这用于在命令行字符串中将程序名称与其参数分开。

trans-unit.source: The program invoked by the --build mode is determined by the CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM variable. For most generators, the particular program does not need to be configured.
trans-unit.target: --build 模式调用的程序由 CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM 变量确定。对于大多数生成器，不需要配置特定程序。

trans-unit.source: The property must be set to a semicolon-separated list of key=value pairs. Each such pair will be transformed into an entry in the solution global section. Whitespace around key and value is ignored. List elements which do not contain an equal sign are skipped.
trans-unit.target: 该属性必须设置为以分号分隔的 key=value 对列表。每个这样的对将被转换为解决方案全局部分中的一个条目。键和值周围的空格将被忽略。不包含等号的列表元素将被跳过。

trans-unit.source: The property must be set to the name of an existing target. This will cause that project to be listed first in the generated solution file causing Visual Studio to make it the startup project if the solution has never been opened before.

trans-unit.source: The protocol aims to provide information to tooling to satisfy several needs:
trans-unit.target: 该协议旨在向工具提供信息,以满足多种需求。

trans-unit.source: The protocol is designed to be useful to IDEs, refactoring tools, and other tools which have a need to understand the buildsystem in entirety.
trans-unit.target: 该协议旨在为IDE、重构工具和其他需要了解整个构建系统的工具提供帮助。

trans-unit.source: The quoted argument "[ \t\r\n]" specifies a regex that matches any single whitespace character.
trans-unit.target: 带引号的参数 "[ \t\r\n]" 指定与任何单个空格字符匹配的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The quoted argument "[/\\]" specifies a regex that matches a single forward slash / or backslash \.
trans-unit.target: 带引号的参数 "[/\\]" 指定与单个正斜杠 / 或反斜杠 \ 匹配的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The quoted argument "[A-Za-z0-9_]" specifies a regex that matches any single “word” character in the C locale.
trans-unit.target: 带引号的参数 "[A-Za-z0-9_]" 指定一个与C语言环境中的任何单个“ word”字符匹配的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The quoted argument "\\(\\a\\+b\\)" specifies a regex that matches the exact string (a+b). Each \\ is parsed in a quoted argument as just \, so the regex itself is actually \(\a\+\b\). This can alternatively be specified in a Bracket Argument without having to escape the backslashes, e.g. [[\(\a\+\b\)]].
trans-unit.target: 带引号的参数 "\\(\\a\\+b\\)" 指定与确切的字符串 (a+b) 匹配的正则表达式。每个 \\ 在加引号的参数中仅被解析为 \ ，因此正则表达式本身实际上是 \(\a\+\b\) 。也可以在括号参数中指定它，而不必转义反斜杠，例如 [[\(\a\+\b\)]] 。

trans-unit.source: The real data files named by expanded DATA{} references may be made available under ExternalData_BINARY_ROOT using symbolic links on some platforms. The ExternalData_NO_SYMLINKS variable may be set to disable use of symbolic links and enable use of copies instead.
trans-unit.target: 在某些平台上，可以使用符号链接在 ExternalData_BINARY_ROOT 下提供由扩展的 DATA{} 引用命名的实际数据文件。可以将 ExternalData_NO_SYMLINKS 变量设置为禁用符号链接的使用，而改为使用副本。

trans-unit.source: The referenced variables may contain the absolute paths to libraries and include directories as found on the machine the package was made on. This would create a package with hard-coded paths to dependencies and not suitable for relocation.
trans-unit.target: 引用的变量可能包含库的绝对路径，并包含在制作软件包的计算机上找到的目录。这将创建一个具有到依赖项的硬编码路径的包，并且不适合重定位。

trans-unit.source: The referenced variables may contain the absolute paths to libraries and include directories as found on the machine the package was made on. This would create a package with hard-coded paths to dependencies not suitable for relocation.
trans-unit.target: 引用的变量可能包含库的绝对路径，并包含在制作软件包的计算机上找到的目录。这将创建一个带有硬编码路径的包，该路径指向不适合重定位的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: The registries are especially useful to help projects find packages in non-standard install locations or directly in their own build trees. A project may populate either the user or system registry (using its own means, see below) to refer to its location. In either case the package should store at the registered location a Package Configuration File (<PackageName>Config.cmake) and optionally a Package Version File (<PackageName>ConfigVersion.cmake).
trans-unit.target: 这些注册表对于帮助项目在非标准安装位置或直接在其自己的构建树中查找软件包特别有用。项目可以填充用户注册表或系统注册表（使用其自身的方法，请参见下文）以引用其位置。无论哪种情况，软件包都应该在注册位置存储软件包配置文件（ <PackageName>Config.cmake ）和可选的软件包版本文件（ <PackageName>ConfigVersion.cmake ）。

trans-unit.source: The replace expression may refer to paren-delimited subexpressions of the match using \1, \2, …, \9. Note that two backslashes (\\1) are required in CMake code to get a backslash through argument parsing.
trans-unit.target: 替换表达式可以使用 \1 ， \2 ，…， \9 引用匹配项的用括号分隔的子表达式。请注意，CMake代码中需要两个反斜杠（ \\1 ）才能通过参数解析获得反斜杠。

trans-unit.source: The reply index file contains a JSON object:
trans-unit.target: 回复索引文件包含一个JSON对象。

trans-unit.source: The reply index file represents each reference to another reply file using a JSON object with members:
trans-unit.target: 回复索引文件用一个带有成员的JSON对象来表示对另一个回复文件的每个引用。

trans-unit.source: The reply will contain a key “configurations”, which will contain a list of configuration objects. Configuration objects are used to destinquish between different configurations the build directory might have enabled. While most generators only support one configuration, others might support several.
trans-unit.target: 答复将包含关键的“配置”，其中将包含配置对象的列表。配置对象用于在构建目录可能已启用的不同配置之间进行查询。虽然大多数生成器仅支持一种配置，但其他生成器可能支持多种配置。

trans-unit.source: The required PROPERTY option is immediately followed by the name of the property being defined.
trans-unit.target: 所需的 PROPERTY 选项后面紧跟要定义的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The required PROPERTY option is immediately followed by the name of the property to get. If the property is not set an empty value is returned, although some properties support inheriting from a parent scope if defined to behave that way (see define_property()).
trans-unit.target: 所需的 PROPERTY 选项后面紧跟要获取的属性名称。如果未设置该属性，则返回一个空值，尽管某些属性支持以定义方式从父作用域继承（请参见 define_property() ）。

trans-unit.source: The required PROPERTY option is immediately followed by the name of the property to set. Remaining arguments are used to compose the property value in the form of a semicolon-separated list.
trans-unit.target: 所需的 PROPERTY 选项后面紧跟要设置的属性的名称。其余参数用于以分号分隔的列表的形式组成属性值。

trans-unit.source: The resource specification file is a JSON file which is passed to CTest, either on the ctest(1) command line as --resource-spec-file, or as the RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE argument of ctest_test(). If a dashboard script is used and RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE is not specified, the value of CTEST_RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE in the dashboard script is used instead. If --resource-spec-file, RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE, and CTEST_RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE in the dashboard script are not specified, the value of CTEST_RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE in the CMake build is used instead. If none of these are specified, no resource spec file is used.
trans-unit.target: 资源规范文件是一个JSON文件，它在 ctest(1) 命令行上以 --resource-spec-file 或 ctest_test() 的 RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE 参数形式传递给CTest 。如果使用仪表板脚本并且未指定 RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE ， CTEST_RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE 使用仪表板脚本中的CTEST_RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE值。如果 --resource-spec-file ， RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE 和 CTEST_RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE 在仪表板脚本没有指定，值 CTEST_RESOURCE_SPEC_FILE 而是使用CMake内部版本。如果未指定任何一个，则不使用资源规范文件。

trans-unit.source: The resource specification file must be a JSON object. All examples in this document assume the following resource specification file:
trans-unit.target: 资源规格文件必须是一个JSON对象。本文档中的所有示例都假定有以下资源规格文件。

trans-unit.source: The rest of the supplied arguments consist of the full paths to the /src/main/java directories of each module within the source tree. These directories are needed and should not be forgotten.
trans-unit.target: 其余提供的参数包括源树中每个模块的 /src/main/java 目录的完整路径。这些目录是必需的，不应忘记。

trans-unit.target: 根据选项 OUTPUT_FORMAT 格式化结果，其中 <format> 是以下内容之一

trans-unit.source: The result will be stored in the internal cache variable <resultVar>, with a boolean true value for success and boolean false for failure.
trans-unit.target: 结果将存储在内部缓存变量 <resultVar> 中，其中，布尔值true表示成功，布尔值false表示失败。

trans-unit.source: The result will be the full path name of the bundle’s main executable file or an error: prefixed string if it could not be determined.
trans-unit.target: 结果将是包的主要可执行文件的完整路径名，或者是 error: 如果无法确定，则为前缀字符串。

trans-unit.target: 生成的 Doxyfile 将包含以下行：

trans-unit.source: The resulting graphs can be huge. The look and content of the generated graphs can be controlled using the file CMakeGraphVizOptions.cmake. This file is first searched in CMAKE_BINARY_DIR, and then in CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR. If found, the variables set in it are used to adjust options for the generated Graphviz files.
trans-unit.target: 结果图可能很大。可以使用文件 CMakeGraphVizOptions.cmake 控制生成图的外观和内容。首先在 CMAKE_BINARY_DIR 中搜索此文件，然后在 CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR 中搜索此文件。如果找到，其中设置的变量将用于调整生成的Graphviz文件的选项。

trans-unit.source: The return code from executing the module command.
trans-unit.target: 执行模块命令的返回代码。

trans-unit.source: The returned directory may or may not exist.
trans-unit.target: 返回的目录可能存在,也可能不存在。

trans-unit.source: The right hand argument to NOT is tested to see if it is a boolean constant, if so the value is used, otherwise it is assumed to be a variable and it is dereferenced.
trans-unit.target: 测试 NOT 的右手参数是否为布尔常量，如果是，则使用该值，否则假定为变量且已取消引用。

trans-unit.source: The root directory of the Google Test installation (may also be set as an environment variable)
trans-unit.target: Google测试安装的根目录(也可以设置为环境变量)。

trans-unit.source: The root folder of the Matlab installation. If set before the call to find_package(), the module will look for the components in that path. If not set, then an automatic search of Matlab will be performed. If set, it should point to a valid version of Matlab.
trans-unit.target: Matlab安装的根文件夹。如果在调用 find_package() 之前设置，则模块将在该路径中查找组件。如果未设置，则将自动搜索Matlab。如果设置，则应指向有效版本的Matlab。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the definition of an IMPORTED target is the directory where it was defined. It may be accessed and used from subdirectories, but not from parent directories or sibling directories. The scope is similar to the scope of a cmake variable.
trans-unit.target: IMPORTED 目标的定义范围是定义目标的目录。可以从子目录访问和使用它，但不能从父目录或兄弟目录访问和使用它。作用域类似于cmake变量的作用域。

trans-unit.source: The script uses find to capture the paths to all of the cobertura.ser files found below the project’s source directory. It keeps the list of files and supplies it as an argument to the cobertura-merge program. The --datafile argument signifies where the result of the merge will be kept.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本使用 find 捕获项目源目录下所有 cobertura.ser 文件的路径。它保留文件列表，并将其作为参数提供给 cobertura-merge 程序。该 --datafile 说法表示在合并的结果将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The script will prompt the user to specify CUDA_TOOLKIT_ROOT_DIR if the prefix cannot be determined by the location of nvcc in the system path and REQUIRED is specified to find_package(). To use a different installed version of the toolkit set the environment variable CUDA_BIN_PATH before running cmake (e.g. CUDA_BIN_PATH=/usr/local/cuda1.0 instead of the default /usr/local/cuda) or set CUDA_TOOLKIT_ROOT_DIR after configuring. If you change the value of CUDA_TOOLKIT_ROOT_DIR, various components that depend on the path will be relocated.
trans-unit.target: 如果前缀不能由nvcc在系统路径中的位置确定，并且将 find_package() 指定为 REQUIRED ,则脚本将提示用户指定 CUDA_TOOLKIT_ROOT_DIR 。要使用工具包的其他已安装版本， CUDA_BIN_PATH 在运行cmake之前设置环境变量CUDA_BIN_PATH（例如 CUDA_BIN_PATH=/usr/local/cuda1.0 而不是默认的 /usr/local/cuda ），或在配置后设置 CUDA_TOOLKIT_ROOT_DIR 。如果更改 CUDA_TOOLKIT_ROOT_DIR 的值，则将重定位依赖于路径的各种组件。

trans-unit.source: The second signature adds a custom command to a target such as a library or executable. This is useful for performing an operation before or after building the target. The command becomes part of the target and will only execute when the target itself is built. If the target is already built, the command will not execute.
trans-unit.target: 第二个签名是将自定义命令添加到目标中,如库或可执行文件。这对于在构建目标之前或之后执行操作非常有用。该命令会成为目标的一部分,并且只有在目标本身被构建时才会执行。如果目标已经被构建,该命令将不会被执行。

trans-unit.source: The second signature for create_javadoc() works on a given list of files.
trans-unit.target: create_javadoc() 的第二个签名适用于给定的文件列表。

trans-unit.target: create_javah() 的第二个签名创建一个封装了头文件生成的目标。例如

trans-unit.source: The server can send signals when it detects changes in the system state. Signals are of type “signal”, have an empty “cookie” and “inReplyTo” field and always have a “name” set to show which signal was sent.
trans-unit.target: 当服务器检测到系统状态变化时，可以发送信号。信号的类型为“信号”，具有空的“ cookie”和“ inReplyTo”字段，并且始终设置为显示发送信号的“名称”。

trans-unit.source: The server can watch the filesystem for changes. The “fileSystemWatchers” command will report on the files and directories watched.
trans-unit.target: 服务器可以监视文件系统的更改。“ fileSystemWatchers”命令将报告所监视的文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: The server has made a copy of this response into the file /tmp/error.txt and took 0.011 seconds to turn the JSON response into a string, and it took 0.025 seconds to process the request in total. The reply has a size of 111 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 服务器将这个响应复制到文件/tmp/error.txt中,用了0.011秒将JSON响应变成字符串,总共用了0.025秒来处理这个请求。响应的大小为111字节。

trans-unit.source: The server is now ready to accept further requests via the named pipe or stdin.
trans-unit.target: 现在服务器已经准备好通过命名的管道或stdin接受进一步的请求。

trans-unit.source: The server will communicate using stdin/stdout (with the --debug parameter) or using a named pipe (with the --pipe=<NAMED_PIPE> parameter). Note that “named pipe” refers to a local domain socket on Unix and to a named pipe on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 服务器将使用stdin / stdout（带有 --debug 参数）或命名管道（带有 --pipe=<NAMED_PIPE> 参数）进行通信。请注意，“命名管道”指的是Unix上的本地域套接字，而指Windows上的命名管道。

trans-unit.source: The server will respond with an empty reply message or an error.
trans-unit.target: 服务器将以一个空的回复信息或错误信息来回应。

trans-unit.source: The set of installation prefixes is constructed using the following steps. If NO_DEFAULT_PATH is specified all NO_* options are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下步骤构造安装前缀集。如果 NO_DEFAULT_PATH 指定所有 NO_* 选项启用。

trans-unit.source: The setting for this policy used when generating the link line is that in effect when the target is created by an add_executable or add_library command. For the example described above, the code
trans-unit.target: 生成链接行时,这个策略的设置是通过add_executable或add_library命令创建目标时的设置。在上面描述的例子中,代码

trans-unit.source: The setting of a policy is confined in some cases to not propagate to the parent scope. For example, if the files read by the include() command or the find_package() command contain a use of cmake_policy(), that policy setting will not affect the caller by default. Both commands accept an optional NO_POLICY_SCOPE keyword to control this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，策略的设置仅限于不传播到父范围。例如，如果 include() 命令或 find_package() 命令读取的文件包含使用 cmake_policy() ，则该策略设置在默认情况下不会影响调用者。这两个命令都接受一个可选的 NO_POLICY_SCOPE 关键字来控制此行为。

trans-unit.source: The setting of policy CMP0010 is not considered, so improper variable reference syntax is always an error.
trans-unit.target: 不考虑策略 CMP0010 的设置，因此不正确的变量引用语法始终是错误。

trans-unit.source: The setup and cleanup tests never list the fixtures they are for in their own FIXTURES_REQUIRED property, as that would result in a dependency on themselves and be considered an error.
trans-unit.target: 设置和清除测试永远不会在自己的 FIXTURES_REQUIRED 属性中列出它们所要使用的装置，因为这会导致对它们的依赖性，并被视为错误。

trans-unit.source: The shell command make genexdebug (invoked after execution of cmake) would then print the result of $<...>.
trans-unit.target: shell命令 make genexdebug （在执行 cmake 之后调用）然后将输出 $<...> 的结果。

trans-unit.source: The site argument is a URL where the archives for downloadable components will reside, e.g., https://cmake.org/files/2.6.1/installer/ All of the archives produced by CPack should be uploaded to that location.
trans-unit.target: site参数是URL，可下载组件的归档文件将驻留在该URL上，例如https://cmake.org/files/2.6.1/installer/ CPack生成的所有归档文件均应上传到该位置。

trans-unit.source: The sort direction can be controlled using the CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_SORT_DIRECTION variable (by default decrescent, e.g. lib-B will be tested before lib-A).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_SORT_DIRECTION 变量控制排序方向（默认情况下为月牙，例如lib-B将在lib-A之前进行测试）。

trans-unit.source: The source and binary directories must first be populated. It is always advised to use different directories for the source and the build.
trans-unit.target: 首先必须填充源代码和二进制目录。建议使用不同的源码和编译目录。

trans-unit.source: The source file generated by bison
trans-unit.target: 由野牛生成的源文件

trans-unit.source: The source file properties will be set in each of the <dirs> directories’ scopes. CMake must already know about each of these source directories, either by having added them through a call to add_subdirectory() or it being the top level source directory. Relative paths are treated as relative to the current source directory.
trans-unit.target: 源文件属性将在每个 <dirs> 目录的作用域中设置。CMake必须已经通过调用 add_subdirectory() 添加了这些源目录，或者它们是顶级源目录，已经知道了每个源目录。相对路径被视为相对于当前源目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The source file properties will be set in each of the directory scopes where any of the specified <targets> were created (the <targets> must therefore already exist).
trans-unit.target: 将在创建任何指定的 <targets> 的每个目录范围中设置源文件属性（因此 <targets> 必须已经存在）。

trans-unit.source: The source file property COMPILE_OPTIONS adds options to one source file.
trans-unit.target: 源文件属性 COMPILE_OPTIONS 将选项添加到一个源文件。

trans-unit.source: The source file property will be read from the <dir> directory’s scope. CMake must already know about that source directory, either by having added it through a call to add_subdirectory() or <dir> being the top level source directory. Relative paths are treated as relative to the current source directory.
trans-unit.target: 源文件属性将从 <dir> 目录的作用域中读取。CMake必须已经知道该源目录，方法是通过调用 add_subdirectory() 或 <dir> 作为顶级源目录将其添加。相对路径被视为相对于当前源目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The source file property will be read from the <dir> directory’s scope. The <dir> may reference either a source directory, or since CMake 3.19, a binary directory. CMake must already know about the directory, either by having added it through a call to add_subdirectory() or <dir> being the top level directory. Relative paths are treated as relative to the current source directory.
trans-unit.target: 源文件属性将从 <dir> 目录的作用域中读取。所述 <dir> 可以引用任一个源目录，或因为CMake的3.19，二进制目录。CMake必须已经知道该目录，方法是通过调用 add_subdirectory() 或 <dir> 作为顶级目录将其添加。相对路径被视为相对于当前源目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The source file property will be read from the directory scope in which <target> was created (<target> must therefore already exist).
trans-unit.target: 源文件属性将与其中的目录范围被读取 <target> 的创建（ <target> 因此，必须已经存在）。

trans-unit.source: The source file property will be set in each of the <dirs> directories’ scopes. Each path may reference either a source directory, or since CMake 3.19, a binary directory. CMake must already know about each of these directories, either by having added them through a call to add_subdirectory() or it being the top level source directory. Relative paths are treated as relative to the current source directory.
trans-unit.target: 源文件属性将在每个 <dirs> 目录的作用域中设置。每个路径都可以引用源目录，也可以引用自CMake 3.19之后的二进制目录。CMake必须已经通过调用 add_subdirectory() 添加了这些目录，或者已经成为顶层源目录，从而已经知道了每个目录。相对路径被视为相对于当前源目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The source file property will be set in each of the directory scopes where any of the specified <targets> were created (the <targets> must therefore already exist).
trans-unit.target: 将在创建任何指定的 <targets> 的每个目录范围中设置源文件属性（因此 <targets> 必须已经存在）。

trans-unit.source: The source file signature of the try_compile() command uses the value of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS variable in the test project so that the test compilation works as it would in the main project. However, CMake 3.6 and below do not also honor config-specific compiler flags such as those in the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_DEBUG variable. CMake 3.7 and above prefer to honor config-specific compiler flags too. This policy provides compatibility for projects that do not expect config-specific compiler flags to be used.
trans-unit.target: try_compile() 命令的源文件签名使用测试项目中 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS 变量的值，以便测试编译像在主项目中那样工作。但是，CMake 3.6及更低版本也不支持特定于配置的编译器标志，例如 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_DEBUG 变量中的那些标志。CMake 3.7及更高版本也喜欢使用特定于配置的编译器标志。此策略为不希望使用特定于配置的编译器标志的项目提供兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The source file then will be compiled by the moc to the output file <base>.moc. A description of the complete output file path is in section Output file location.
trans-unit.target: 然后，源文件将由 moc 编译为输出文件 <base>.moc 。输出文件位置一节中提供了完整的输出文件路径的说明。

trans-unit.source: The source tree is updated by git fetch followed by git reset --hard to the FETCH_HEAD. The result is the same as git pull except that any local modifications are overwritten. Use GITUpdateCustom to specify a different approach.
trans-unit.target: 通过 git fetch 和 git reset --hard 将源树更新为 FETCH_HEAD 。结果与 git pull 相同，除了所有本地修改都被覆盖。使用 GITUpdateCustom 指定其他方法。

trans-unit.source: The source will be moc compiled again if a file from the additional file dependencies changes.
trans-unit.target: 来源将是 moc 如果从附加文件的文件依赖关系的变化再次编译。

trans-unit.source: The sources in the target OpenSSL::applink that is mentioned above. This variable shall always be undefined if found openssl version is less than 0.9.8 or if platform is not MSVC.
trans-unit.target: 上面提到的目标 OpenSSL::applink 中的源。如果发现的openssl版本小于0.9.8或平台不是MSVC，则该变量始终是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: The specification date is formatted as given in the OpenACC standard: yyyymm where yyyy and mm represents the year and month of the OpenACC specification implemented by the <lang> compiler.
trans-unit.target: 规范日期的格式设置为OpenACC标准中给出的格式： yyyymm ，其中 yyyy 和 mm 表示由 <lang> 编译器实现的OpenACC规范的年份和月份。

trans-unit.source: The specification date is formatted as given in the OpenMP standard: yyyymm where yyyy and mm represents the year and month of the OpenMP specification implemented by the <lang> compiler.
trans-unit.target: 规范日期的格式与OpenMP标准中给出的格式相同： yyyymm ，其中 yyyy 和 mm 表示由 <lang> 编译器实现的OpenMP规范的年和月。

trans-unit.source: The specified arguments are passed to the cmake command line. They can be any argument the cmake command understands, not just cache values defined by -D... arguments (see also CMake Options). In addition, arguments may use generator expressions.
trans-unit.target: 指定的参数将传递给 cmake 命令行。它们可以是 cmake 命令可以理解的任何参数，而不仅仅是缓存 -D... 参数定义的值（另请参阅 CMake Options ）。另外，参数可以使用 generator expressions 。

trans-unit.source: The specified manual is printed in a human-readable text format. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: 指定的手册以易于阅读的文本格式打印。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The standard output from executing the module command.
trans-unit.target: 执行模块命令的标准输出。

trans-unit.source: The standard output or standard error results will be quietly ignored.
trans-unit.target: 标准输出或标准误差结果将被悄悄忽略。

trans-unit.source: The standard output or standard error will not be exclusively redirected to the configured variables.
trans-unit.target: 标准输出或标准误差将不会专门重定向到配置的变量。

trans-unit.source: The static library file (e.g. .lib or .a) of a static library target created by the add_library() command with the STATIC option.
trans-unit.target: 由具有 STATIC 选项的 add_library() 命令创建的静态库目标的静态库文件（例如 .lib 或 .a ）。

trans-unit.source: The string “ctestInfo”.
trans-unit.target: 字符串“ ctestInfo”。

trans-unit.source: The suffix corresponds to the file extension (such as “.so” or “.exe”).
trans-unit.target: 后缀对应于文件扩展名（例如“ .so”或“ .exe”）。

trans-unit.source: The suffix corresponds to the file extension (such as “.so” or “.lib”).
trans-unit.target: 后缀对应于文件扩展名（例如“ .so”或“ .lib”）。

trans-unit.source: The suffix for executables on this platform.
trans-unit.target: 这个平台上可执行文件的后缀。

trans-unit.source: The suffix for import libraries that you link to.
trans-unit.target: 你链接到的导入库的后缀。

trans-unit.source: The suffix for libraries that you link to.
trans-unit.target: 你链接到的库的后缀。

trans-unit.source: The suffix for shared libraries that you link to.
trans-unit.target: 你链接到的共享库的后缀。

trans-unit.source: The suffix for static libraries that you link to.
trans-unit.target: 你链接到的静态库的后缀。

trans-unit.source: The suffix to use for the end of a library filename, .lib on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 库文件名末尾使用的后缀，在Windows上为 .lib 。

trans-unit.source: The suffix to use for the end of a loadable module filename on this platform
trans-unit.target: 在这个平台上,用于可加载模块文件名结尾的后缀。

trans-unit.source: The suffix to use for the end of a shared library filename, .dll on Windows.
trans-unit.target: Windows 共享库文件名 .dll 的后缀。

trans-unit.source: The suffix to use for the end of a static library filename, .lib on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 后缀用于静态库文件名Windows上的 .lib 。

trans-unit.source: The suffix to use for the end of an executable filename if any, .exe on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 用于后缀的可执行文件名的后缀，如果是Windows上的 .exe 。

trans-unit.source: The suffix to use for the end of an import library filename if used on this platform.
trans-unit.target: 如果在这个平台上使用,导入库文件名的后缀。

trans-unit.source: The supported options for FetchContent_Populate() are the same as those for FetchContent_Declare(). Those few options shown just above are either specific to FetchContent_Populate() or their behavior is slightly modified from how ExternalProject_Add() treats them.
trans-unit.target: 为支持的选项 FetchContent_Populate() 是一样的那些 FetchContent_Declare() 。上面显示的少数几个选项或者特定于 FetchContent_Populate() ,或者它们的行为与 ExternalProject_Add() 对待它们的方式有所不同。

trans-unit.source: The system directories that are contained in CMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH are locations that typically include installed software. An example being /usr/local for UNIX based platforms. In addition to standard platform locations, CMake will also add values to CMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH based on environment variables. The environment variables and search locations that CMake uses may evolve over time, as platforms and their conventions also evolve. The following provides an indicative list of environment variables and locations that CMake searches, but they are subject to change:
trans-unit.target: CMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH 中包含的系统目录是通常包含已安装软件的位置。对于基于UNIX的平台，示例为 /usr/local 。除了标准平台位置之外，CMake还将基于环境变量将值添加到 CMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH 。随着平台及其约定的发展，CMake使用的环境变量和搜索位置可能会随着时间而变化。以下提供了CMake搜索的环境变量和位置的指示性列表，但它们可能会发生变化：

trans-unit.source: The target for cross-compiling, if supported.
trans-unit.target: 交叉编译的目标,如果支持的话。

trans-unit.source: The target in the TARGET signature of add_custom_command() must exist and must be defined in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: add_custom_command() 的 TARGET 签名中的目标必须存在，并且必须在当前目录中定义。

trans-unit.source: The target is being cross-compiled and an emulator is provided (i.e. its CROSSCOMPILING_EMULATOR target property is set). In this case, the contents of CROSSCOMPILING_EMULATOR will be prepended to the command before the location of the target executable.
trans-unit.target: 正在交叉编译目标并提供了仿真器（即，设置了其 CROSSCOMPILING_EMULATOR 目标属性）。在这种情况下， CROSSCOMPILING_EMULATOR 的内容将在目标可执行文件的位置之前添加到命令之前。

trans-unit.source: The target is not being cross-compiled (i.e. the CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING variable is not set to true).
trans-unit.target: 目标没有交叉编译（即 CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING 变量未设置为true）。

trans-unit.source: The target name tgt if the target exists, an empty string otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 目标名称 tgt (如果目标存在），否则为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The target properties ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY, LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY, and RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY supersede this variable for a target if they are set. Library targets are otherwise placed in this directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置目标属性 ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ， LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 和RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY，则该 RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 替代目标变量。否则库目标将放置在此目录中。

trans-unit.source: The target properties CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET and VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN can be used to add the appropriate compile flags for targets. See the documentation of those target properties, and the convenience variables CMAKE_CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET and CMAKE_VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN.
trans-unit.target: 目标属性 CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET 和 VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN 可用于为目标添加适当的编译标志。请参阅这些目标属性的文档以及便捷变量 CMAKE_CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET 和 CMAKE_VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN 。

trans-unit.source: The target property RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY supercedes this variable for a target if it is set. Executable targets are otherwise placed in this directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了目标属性，则目标属性 RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 将替代该变量。否则，可执行目标将放置在此目录中。

trans-unit.source: The target property values are used by the generators to set the include paths for the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 目标属性值被生成器用来设置编译器的包含路径。

trans-unit.source: The target to be linked to is a regular non-imported, non-interface library target.
trans-unit.target: 要链接的目标是一个普通的非导入、非接口库目标。

trans-unit.source: The target’s SOURCE_DIR property differs from CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR.
trans-unit.target: 目标的 SOURCE_DIR 属性与 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR 不同。

trans-unit.source: The test step is only defined if at least one of the following TEST_... options are provided.
trans-unit.target: 仅当至少提供以下 TEST_... 选项之一时，才定义测试步骤。

trans-unit.source: The thread library to use. This may be empty if the thread functions are provided by the system libraries and no special flags are needed to use them.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的线程库。如果线程函数是由系统库提供的,不需要特殊标志就可以使用,那么这个库可能是空的。

trans-unit.source: The thread library, if found.
trans-unit.target: 线程库,如果发现。

trans-unit.source: The time limit in seconds
trans-unit.target: 时间限制(秒)

trans-unit.source: The tool selected depends on the CMAKE_GENERATOR used to configure the project:
trans-unit.target: 选择的工具取决于用于配置项目的 CMAKE_GENERATOR ：

trans-unit.source: The toolset version of Microsoft Visual C/C++ being used if any. If MSVC-like is being used, this variable is set based on the version of the compiler as given by the MSVC_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的话，将使用Microsoft Visual C / C ++的工具集版本。如果使用的是类似MSVC的版本，则根据 MSVC_VERSION 变量给出的编译器版本设置此变量。

trans-unit.source: The top of the module should begin with a license notice, followed by a blank line, and then followed by a Bracket Comment. The comment should begin with .rst: to indicate that the rest of its content is reStructuredText-format documentation. For example:
trans-unit.target: 模块的顶部应以许可证声明开头，然后是空白行，然后是括号注释。注释应以 .rst: 开头，以指示其其余内容为reStructuredText格式的文档。例如：

trans-unit.source: The top-level CMakeLists.txt file for a project must contain a literal, direct call to the project() command; loading one through the include() command is not sufficient. If no such call exists, CMake will issue a warning and pretend there is a project(Project) at the top to enable the default languages (C and CXX).
trans-unit.target: 项目的顶层 CMakeLists.txt 文件必须包含直接对 project() 命令的直接调用；通过 include() 命令加载一个是不够的。如果不存在这样的调用，CMake将发出警告，并假装顶部有一个 project(Project) 以启用默认语言（ C 和 CXX ）。

trans-unit.source: The top-level directory containing source files provided by the project. The project specifies its buildsystem using files as described in the cmake-language(7) manual, starting with a top-level file named CMakeLists.txt. These files specify build targets and their dependencies as described in the cmake-buildsystem(7) manual.
trans-unit.target: 包含项目提供的源文件的顶级目录。该项目使用 cmake-language(7) 手册中所述的文件指定其构建系统，该文件从名为 CMakeLists.txt 的顶级文件开始。这些文件指定了构建目标及其依赖性，如 cmake-buildsystem(7) 手册中所述。

trans-unit.source: The top-level directory in which buildsystem files and build output artifacts (e.g. executables and libraries) are to be stored. CMake will write a CMakeCache.txt file to identify the directory as a build tree and store persistent information such as buildsystem configuration options.
trans-unit.target: 顶级目录，用于存储构建系统文件和构建输出工件（例如，可执行文件和库）。CMake将编写一个 CMakeCache.txt 文件，以将该目录标识为构建树并存储持久性信息，例如buildsystem配置选项。

trans-unit.source: The total number of groups specified by the RESOURCE_GROUPS property. For example:
trans-unit.target: RESOURCE_GROUPS 属性指定的组总数。例如：

trans-unit.source: The traditional approach is to use variables for everything, including libraries and executables: see the Standard Variable Names section below. This is what most of the existing find modules provided by CMake do.
trans-unit.target: 传统方法是对所有内容使用变量，包括库和可执行文件：请参见下面的“ 标准变量名称”部分。这是CMake提供的大多数现有查找模块的功能。

trans-unit.source: The tweak version of the top level project.
trans-unit.target: 顶层项目的调整版。

trans-unit.source: The type of the IMPORTED target created in the add_library() command can always be specified as UNKNOWN type. This simplifies the code in cases where static or shared variants may be found, and CMake will determine the type by inspecting the files.
trans-unit.target: 的类型的 IMPORTED 在所创建的目标 add_library() 命令总是可以被指定为 UNKNOWN 类型。如果可以找到静态或共享的变体，这将简化代码，并且CMake将通过检查文件来确定类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the target.
trans-unit.target: 目标的类型;

trans-unit.source: The underlying implementation relies on the LINK_OPTIONS property to check the specified flag. The LINKER: prefix, as described in the target_link_options() command, can be used as well.
trans-unit.target: 基础实现依赖于 LINK_OPTIONS 属性检查指定的标志。也可以使用 target_link_options() 命令中所述的 LINKER: 前缀。

trans-unit.source: The unit test uses the Matlab unittest framework (default, available starting Matlab 2013b+) except if the option NO_UNITTEST_FRAMEWORK is given.
trans-unit.target: 单元测试使用Matlab单元测试框架（默认值，从Matlab 2013b +开始可用），除非给出了选项 NO_UNITTEST_FRAMEWORK 。

trans-unit.source: The update always follows the version control branch currently checked out in the source directory. See the CTest Update Step documentation for information about variables that change the behavior of ctest_update().
trans-unit.target: 更新始终遵循源目录中当前检出的版本控制分支。有关更改 ctest_update() 行为的变量的信息，请参见CTest更新步骤文档。

trans-unit.source: The usage requirements of a target can transitively propagate to dependents. The target_link_libraries() command has PRIVATE, INTERFACE and PUBLIC keywords to control the propagation.
trans-unit.target: 目标的使用要求可以传递给依赖对象。所述 target_link_libraries() 命令具有 PRIVATE ， INTERFACE 和 PUBLIC 关键字来控制传播。

trans-unit.source: The use of double-colons is a common pattern used to namespace IMPORTED targets and ALIAS targets. When computing the link dependencies of a target, the name of each dependency could either be a target, or a file on disk. Previously, if a target was not found with a matching name, the name was considered to refer to a file on disk. This can lead to confusing error messages if there is a typo in what should be a target name.
trans-unit.target: 使用双冒号是用于命名 IMPORTED 目标和 ALIAS 目标的命名空间的常见模式。在计算目标的链接依赖性时，每个依赖性的名称可以是目标，也可以是磁盘上的文件。以前，如果找不到与名称匹配的目标，则该名称被认为是指磁盘上的文件。如果目标名称中有错字，则可能导致混淆错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The user may override the default generator with the -G option:
trans-unit.target: 用户可以使用 -G 选项覆盖默认生成器：

trans-unit.source: The user may set the environment variable FREETYPE_DIR to the root directory of a Freetype installation.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以将环境变量 FREETYPE_DIR 设置为Freetype安装的根目录。

trans-unit.source: The user’s path is searched for nvcc using find_program(). If this is found, no subsequent search attempts are performed. Users are responsible for ensuring that the first nvcc to show up in the path is the desired path in the event that multiple CUDA Toolkits are installed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 find_program() 在用户路径中搜索 nvcc 。如果找到此内容，则不执行后续搜索尝试。如果安装了多个CUDA工具包，则用户有责任确保在路径中显示的第一个 nvcc 是所需的路径。

trans-unit.source: The value for each resource type is a JSON array consisting of JSON objects, each of which describe a specific instance of the specified resource. These objects have the following members:
trans-unit.target: 每种资源类型的值都是由JSON对象组成的JSON数组,每个对象都描述了指定资源的具体实例。这些对象有以下成员:

trans-unit.source: The value is ignored on non-MSVC compilers but an unsupported value will be rejected as an error when using a compiler targeting the MSVC ABI.
trans-unit.target: 该值在非MSVC编译器上被忽略,但当使用以MSVC ABI为目标的编译器时,不支持的值将作为错误被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: The value may also be the empty string ("") in which case no runtime library selection flag will be added explicitly by CMake. Note that with Visual Studio Generators the native build system may choose to add its own default runtime library selection flag.
trans-unit.target: 该值也可以是空字符串（ "" ），在这种情况下，CMake不会显式添加任何运行时库选择标志。请注意，使用Visual Studio Generators，本机生成系统可以选择添加其自己的默认运行时库选择标志。

trans-unit.source: The value must be a semi-colon separated list of configuration names. Currently this property is used only by the target_link_libraries() command. Additional uses may be defined in the future.
trans-unit.target: 该值必须是用分号分隔的配置名称列表。当前，此属性仅由 target_link_libraries() 命令使用。将来可能会定义其他用途。

trans-unit.source: The value of the variable. On a modification, this is the new (modified) value of the variable. On removal, the value is empty.
trans-unit.target: 变量的值。修改时,是变量的新值。移除时,值为空。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is used by the generators to set the include paths for the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值被生成器用来设置编译器的包含路径。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is used by the generators to set the link libraries for the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性的值被生成器用来设置编译器的链接库。

trans-unit.source: The value of this variable must be a subset of CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES.
trans-unit.target: 此变量的值必须是 CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES 的子集。

trans-unit.source: The value of this variable must be a subset of CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS or be the same as CMAKE_DEFAULT_BUILD_TYPE. It must not be specified if CMAKE_DEFAULT_BUILD_TYPE or CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS is not used.
trans-unit.target: 此变量的值必须是 CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS 的子集或与 CMAKE_DEFAULT_BUILD_TYPE 相同。如果未使用 CMAKE_DEFAULT_BUILD_TYPE 或 CMAKE_CROSS_CONFIGS ,则不得指定它。

trans-unit.source: The value of this variable must be one of the items from CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES.
trans-unit.target: 此变量的值必须是 CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES 中的一项。

trans-unit.source: The value of this variable should be set prior to the first project() or enable_language() command invocation because it may influence configuration of the toolchain and flags. It is intended to be set locally by the user creating a build tree. This variable should be set as a CACHE entry (or else CMake may remove it while initializing a cache entry of the same name).
trans-unit.target: 此变量的值应在首次调用 project() 或 enable_language() 命令之前设置，因为它可能会影响工具链和标志的配置。它旨在由用户创建构建树在本地设置。该变量应设置为 CACHE 条目（否则CMake可能会在初始化同名的缓存条目时将其删除）。

trans-unit.source: The value of this variable should never be modified by project code. A generator may be selected via the cmake(1)-G option, interactively in cmake-gui(1), or via the CMAKE_GENERATOR environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 此变量的值永远不能被项目代码修改。可以通过 cmake(1) -G 选项，在 cmake-gui(1) 中交互地选择生成器，或者通过 CMAKE_GENERATOR 环境变量来选择生成器。

trans-unit.source: The value of this variable should never be modified by project code. A toolchain file specified by the CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE variable may initialize CMAKE_GENERATOR_INSTANCE as a cache entry. Once a given build tree has been initialized with a particular value for this variable, changing the value has undefined behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此变量的值永远不能被项目代码修改。 CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE 变量指定的工具链文件可以将 CMAKE_GENERATOR_INSTANCE 初始化为缓存条目。一旦使用该变量的特定值初始化给定的构建树，更改该值将具有未定义的行为。

trans-unit.source: The value of this variable should never be modified by project code. A toolchain file specified by the CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE variable may initialize CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM. Once a given build tree has been initialized with a particular value for this variable, changing the value has undefined behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此变量的值永远不能被项目代码修改。 CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE 变量指定的工具链文件可以初始化 CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM 。一旦使用该变量的特定值初始化给定的构建树，更改该值将具有未定义的行为。

trans-unit.source: The value of this variable should never be modified by project code. A toolchain file specified by the CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE variable may initialize CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET. Once a given build tree has been initialized with a particular value for this variable, changing the value has undefined behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此变量的值永远不能被项目代码修改。 CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE 变量指定的工具链文件可以初始化 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET 。一旦使用该变量的特定值初始化给定的构建树，更改该值将具有未定义的行为。

trans-unit.source: The values of the three variables can also be retrieved from anywhere in the project hierarchy using the FetchContent_GetProperties() command.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用 FetchContent_GetProperties() 命令从项目层次结构中的任何位置检索这三个变量的值。

trans-unit.source: The variable Matlab_ROOT_DIR may be specified in order to give the path of the desired Matlab version. Otherwise, the behaviour is platform specific:
trans-unit.target: 可以指定变量 Matlab_ROOT_DIR ，以给出所需Matlab版本的路径。否则，该行为是特定于平台的：

trans-unit.source: The variable ${VARIABLE} may be 0 when CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES has multiple architectures for building OS X universal binaries. This indicates that the type size varies across architectures. In this case ${VARIABLE}_CODE contains C preprocessor tests mapping from each architecture macro to the corresponding type size. The list of architecture macros is stored in ${VARIABLE}_KEYS, and the value for each key is stored in ${VARIABLE}-${KEY}.
trans-unit.target: 当 CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES 具有用于构建OS X通用二进制文件的多种体系结构时，变量 ${VARIABLE} 可以为 0 。这表明类型大小随体系结构而变化。在这种情况下， ${VARIABLE}_CODE 包含从每个体系结构宏到对应类型大小的C预处理程序测试。体系结构宏的列表存储在 ${VARIABLE}_KEYS ，每个键的值存储在 ${VARIABLE}-${KEY} 。

trans-unit.source: The variable CMAKE_EP_GIT_REMOTE_UPDATE_STRATEGY can be set to override the default strategy. This variable should not be set by a project, it is intended for the user to set. It is primarily intended for use in continuous integration scripts to ensure that when history is rewritten on a remote branch, the build doesn’t end up with unintended changes or failed builds resulting from conflicts during rebase operations.
trans-unit.target: 可以将变量 CMAKE_EP_GIT_REMOTE_UPDATE_STRATEGY 设置为覆盖默认策略。此变量不应由项目设置，而是应由用户设置。它主要用于连续集成脚本中，以确保在远程分支上重写历史记录时，构建不会因意外更改或由于变基操作期间的冲突而导致构建失败而结束。

trans-unit.source: The variable MPI_<lang>_INCLUDE_DIRS will be assembled from the following variables. For C and CXX:
trans-unit.target: 变量 MPI_<lang>_INCLUDE_DIRS 将由以下变量组成。对于C和CXX：

trans-unit.source: The variable MPI_<lang>_LIBRARIES will be assembled from the following variables:
trans-unit.target: 变量 MPI_<lang>_LIBRARIES 将由以下变量组成：

trans-unit.source: The variable GET_PREREQUISITES_VERBOSE can be set to true to enable verbose output.
trans-unit.target: 变量GET_PREREQUISITES_VERBOSE可以被设置为true,以启用verbose输出。

trans-unit.source: The variable could be set in a user supplied toolchain file or via -D on the command line.
trans-unit.target: 该变量可以在用户提供的工具链文件中设置，也可以在命令行上通过 -D 设置。

trans-unit.source: The variable named by outVar will be populated in the calling scope with the list of discovered test cases. This allows the caller to do things like manipulate test properties of the discovered tests.
trans-unit.target: 由 outVar 命名的变量将在调用范围中填充发现的测试用例列表。这允许调用者执行诸如操作发现的测试的测试属性之类的操作。

trans-unit.source: The variable named will be set with the contents of the standard output and standard error pipes, respectively. If the same variable is named for both pipes their output will be merged in the order produced.
trans-unit.target: 被命名的变量将分别设置标准输出和标准错误管道的内容。如果两个管道使用相同的变量命名,它们的输出将按照产生的顺序进行合并。

trans-unit.source: The variable will be set to contain the result of all processes as a semicolon-separated list, in order of the given COMMAND arguments. Each entry will be an integer return code from the corresponding child or a string describing an error condition.
trans-unit.target: 变量将被设置为以给定 COMMAND 参数的顺序包含所有处理的结果，以分号分隔的列表的形式出现。每个条目都是对应子项的整数返回码或描述错误情况的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The variable will be set to contain the result of last child process. This will be an integer return code from the last child or a string describing an error condition.
trans-unit.target: 该变量将被设置为包含最后一个子进程的结果。这将是最后一个子进程的整数返回代码或描述错误条件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The variables <var1> to <varN> given as PATH_VARS are the variables which contain install destinations. For each of them the macro will create a helper variable PACKAGE_<var...>. These helper variables must be used in the FooConfig.cmake.in file for setting the installed location. They are calculated by configure_package_config_file so that they are always relative to the installed location of the package. This works both for relative and also for absolute locations. For absolute locations it works only if the absolute location is a subdirectory of INSTALL_PREFIX.
trans-unit.target: 变量 <var1> 到 <varN> 给出 PATH_VARS 是含有安装目的地的变量。宏将为每个宏创建一个辅助变量 PACKAGE_<var...> 。必须在 FooConfig.cmake.in 文件中使用这些帮助程序变量来设置安装位置。它们由 configure_package_config_file 计算，因此它们始终相对于软件包的安装位置。这对于相对位置和绝对位置都适用。对于绝对位置，仅当绝对位置是 INSTALL_PREFIX 的子目录时，它才有效。

trans-unit.source: The variables report the version of the package that was actually found. The <PackageName> part of their name matches the argument given to the find_package() command.
trans-unit.target: 变量报告实际找到的软件包的版本。它们名称的 <PackageName> 部分与给 find_package() 命令提供的参数匹配。

trans-unit.source: The variables set through the VERSION, DESCRIPTION and HOMEPAGE_URL options are intended for use as default values in package metadata and documentation.
trans-unit.target: 通过 VERSION ， DESCRIPTION 和 HOMEPAGE_URL 选项设置的变量旨在用作包元数据和文档中的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The version file checks whether it satisfies the requested version and sets these variables:
trans-unit.target: 版本文件检查是否满足要求的版本,并设置这些变量。

trans-unit.source: The version file must use these variables to check whether it is compatible or an exact match for the requested version and set the following variables with results:
trans-unit.target: 版本文件必须使用这些变量来检查它是否与请求的版本兼容或完全匹配,并将结果设置为以下变量。

trans-unit.source: The version given to the find_package() directive is the Matlab version, which should not be confused with the Matlab release name (eg. R2014). The matlab_get_version_from_release_name() and matlab_get_release_name_from_version() provide a mapping between the release name and the version.
trans-unit.target: 给 find_package() 指令提供的版本是Matlab 版本，请勿将其与Matlab 版本名称混淆（例如 R2014 ）。所述 matlab_get_version_from_release_name() 和 matlab_get_release_name_from_version() 提供释放名称和版本之间的映射。

trans-unit.source: The version of curl found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的 curl 版本。

trans-unit.target: 使用的Microsoft Visual C / C ++版本。如果使用的是模拟Visual C ++的编译器，则将此变量设置为 _MSC_VER 预处理程序定义所给定的模拟工具集版本。

trans-unit.source: The version of the C compiler used. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 使用的C编译器版本。另请参见 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.target: 使用的CXX编译器版本。另请参见 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: The version of the Fortran compiler used. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 使用的Fortran编译器版本。另请参见 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: The version of the ISPC compiler used. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 使用的ISPC编译器的版本。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: The version of the OBJC compiler used. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 使用的OBJC编译器版本。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: The version of the OBJCXX compiler used. See also the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION variable.
trans-unit.target: 使用的OBJCXX编译器的版本。另请参阅 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: The version of the operating system for which CMake is to build. See the CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME variable for the OS name.
trans-unit.target: 要为其构建CMake的操作系统版本。有关操作系统名称，请参见 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 变量。

trans-unit.source: The version of the top level project.
trans-unit.target: 顶层项目的版本。

trans-unit.source: There are multiple signatures for this command. Some of them define installation options for files and targets. Options common to multiple signatures are covered here but they are valid only for signatures that specify them. The common options are:
trans-unit.target: 这个命令有多个签名。其中一些定义了文件和目标的安装选项。这里涵盖了多个签名所共有的选项,但它们只对指定它们的签名有效。常见的选项有:

trans-unit.source: There are reasons one might want to exclude a target / generated project from deployment:
trans-unit.target: 有一些原因可以让我们从部署中排除一个目标/生成的项目。

trans-unit.source: There are several user interface tools which may be used to generate a buildsystem from CMake files. The ccmake(1) and cmake-gui(1) tools guide the user through setting the various necessary options. The cmake(1) tool can be invoked to specify options on the command line. This manual describes options which may be set using any of the user interface tools, though the mode of setting an option is different for each tool.
trans-unit.target: 有几种用户界面工具可用于从CMake文件生成构建系统。所述 ccmake(1) 和 cmake-gui(1) 的工具引导用户通过设置各种必要的选项。所述 cmake(1) 的工具可以被调用来指定命令行选项。本手册介绍了可以使用任何用户界面工具进行设置的选项，尽管每种工具的设置方式都不同。

trans-unit.source: There are situations where it may be undesirable for a particular config option to be automatically quoted by doxygen_add_docs(), such as ALIASES which may need to include its own embedded quoting. The DOXYGEN_VERBATIM_VARS variable can be used to specify a list of Doxygen variables (including the leading DOXYGEN_ prefix) which should not be quoted. The project is then responsible for ensuring that those variables’ values make sense when placed directly in the Doxygen input file. In the case of list variables, list items are still separated by spaces, it is only the automatic quoting that is skipped. For example, the following allows doxygen_add_docs() to apply quoting to DOXYGEN_PROJECT_BRIEF, but not each item in the DOXYGEN_ALIASES list (bracket syntax can also be used to make working with embedded quotes easier):
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，可能不希望 doxygen_add_docs() 自动引用特定的配置选项，例如 ALIASES ，可能需要包括其自己的嵌入式引用。该 DOXYGEN_VERBATIM_VARS 变量可以用于指定Doxygen的变量（包括领先的目录 DOXYGEN_ 不应被引用前缀）。然后，该项目负责确保将这些变量的值直接放在Doxygen输入文件中时有意义。对于列表变量，列表项仍由空格分隔，仅跳过自动引用。例如，以下允许 doxygen_add_docs() 将引用应用于 DOXYGEN_PROJECT_BRIEF ，但不是 DOXYGEN_ALIASES 列表中的每个项目（括号语法也可用于简化嵌入引号的使用）：

trans-unit.source: There are some cases where CMake may ask the linker to search for the library (e.g. /usr/lib/libfoo.so becomes -lfoo), such as when a shared library is detected to have no SONAME field. See policy CMP0060 for discussion of another case.
trans-unit.target: 也有一些情况，其中的CMake可询问链接程序搜索的库（例如 /usr/lib/libfoo.so 变得 -lfoo ），当检测到一个共享库具有没有如 SONAME 字段。有关其他情况的讨论，请参阅策略 CMP0060 。

trans-unit.source: There are some special variables whose prefix depends on the number of <moduleSpec> given. When there is only one <moduleSpec>, <YYY> will simply be <prefix>, but if two or more <moduleSpec> items are given, <YYY> will be <prefix>_<moduleName>.
trans-unit.target: 有一些特殊变量，其前缀取决于给定的 <moduleSpec> 的数量。当只有一个 <moduleSpec> 时， <YYY> 将简单地为 <prefix> ，但是如果给出两个或多个 <moduleSpec> 项，则 <YYY> 将为 <prefix>_<moduleName> 。

trans-unit.source: There are three kinds of output artifacts that may be build by targets as detailed in the following sections. Their classification differs between DLL platforms and non-DLL platforms. All Windows-based systems including Cygwin are DLL platforms.
trans-unit.target: 目标可以构建的输出工件有三种,详见以下章节。它们的分类在DLL平台和非DLL平台之间有所不同。所有基于Windows的系统包括Cygwin都是DLL平台。

trans-unit.source: There are three types of arguments within Command Invocations:
trans-unit.target: 命令调用中有三种类型的参数：

trans-unit.source: There are too many factors involved in making an automatic decision in the presence of multiple CUDA Toolkits being installed. In this situation, users are encouraged to either (1) set CUDAToolkit_ROOT or (2) ensure that the correct nvcc executable shows up in $PATH for find_program() to find.
trans-unit.target: 在安装多个CUDA工具包的情况下，做出自动决策的因素太多。在这种情况下，建议用户（1）设置 CUDAToolkit_ROOT 或（2）确保在 $PATH 显示正确的 nvcc 可执行文件，以供 find_program() 查找。

trans-unit.source: There are two main signatures for add_custom_command.
trans-unit.target: add_custom_command 有两个主要签名。

trans-unit.target: create_javadoc() 有两个主要签名。第一个签名与源文件路径上的包名称一起使用。

trans-unit.source: There are two search branches: a windows style and a unix style. For windows, the following variables are searched for and set to defaults in case of multiple choices. Change them if the defaults are not desired (i.e., these are the only variables you should change to select a configuration):
trans-unit.target: 有两个搜索分支:windows风格和unix风格。对于windows来说,在有多个选择的情况下,以下变量会被搜索并设置为默认值。如果不需要默认值,请更改它们(也就是说,这些是你选择配置时唯一需要更改的变量)。

trans-unit.source: There are two signatures:
trans-unit.target: 有两个签名。

trans-unit.source: There is a similar variable CPACK_COMPONENT_INCLUDE_TOPLEVEL_DIRECTORY which may be used to override the behavior for the component packaging case which may have different default value for historical (now backward compatibility) reason.
trans-unit.target: 有一个类似的变量 CPACK_COMPONENT_INCLUDE_TOPLEVEL_DIRECTORY ，可用于覆盖组件包装箱的行为，出于历史（现在是向后兼容）的原因，该包装可能具有不同的默认值。

trans-unit.source: There is also a wxWidgets_CONFIG_OPTIONS variable for all other options that need to be passed to the wx-config utility. For example, to use the base toolkit found in the /usr/local path, set the variable (before calling the FIND_PACKAGE command) as such:
trans-unit.target: 还有一个 wxWidgets_CONFIG_OPTIONS 变量,用于所有其他需要传递给 wx-config 工具的选项。例如,如果要使用在 /usr/local 路径中找到的基本工具包,可以在调用 FIND_PACKAGE 命令之前设置这个变量。

trans-unit.source: There is no automatic evaluation for environment or cache Variable References. Their values must be referenced as $ENV{<name>} or $CACHE{<name>} wherever the above-documented condition syntax accepts <variable|string>.
trans-unit.target: 没有自动评估环境或缓存变量引用。无论上述文档中的条件语法接受 <variable|string> 它们的值都必须引用为 $ENV{<name>} 或 $CACHE{<name>} 。

trans-unit.source: There is no convention provided by CMake for how such variables are named between different provided buildsystems, except that variables with the prefix CMAKE_ usually refer to options provided by CMake itself and should not be used in third-party options, which should use their own prefix instead. The cmake-gui(1) tool can display options in groups defined by their prefix, so it makes sense for third parties to ensure that they use a self-consistent prefix.
trans-unit.target: CMake没有提供关于在不同的提供的构建系统之间如何命名此类变量的约定，只是带有前缀 CMAKE_ 的变量通常引用CMake本身提供的选项，并且不应在第三方选项中使用，后者应使用其自己的前缀代替。该 cmake-gui(1) 工具可以显示通过它们的前缀定义的组选项，因此它是有道理的第三方，以确保它们使用一个自洽的前缀。

trans-unit.source: There is no system package registry on non-Windows platforms.
trans-unit.target: 非Windows平台上没有系统包注册表。

trans-unit.source: There is only one cache object major version, version 2. Version 1 does not exist to avoid confusion with that from cmake-server(7) mode.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个 cache 对象主版本，即版本2。不存在版本1，以避免与 cmake-server(7) 模式的版本混淆。

trans-unit.source: There is only one cmakeFiles object major version, version 1.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个 cmakeFiles 对象主版本1。

trans-unit.source: There is only one codemodel object major version, version 2. Version 1 does not exist to avoid confusion with that from cmake-server(7) mode.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个 codemodel 对象主版本，即版本2。不存在版本1，以避免与 cmake-server(7) 模式的版本混淆。

trans-unit.source: There may be additional files providing CMake macros or Imported Targets for you to use. CMake does not enforce any naming convention for these files. They are related to the primary Config file by use of the CMake include() command.
trans-unit.target: 可能还有其他文件提供CMake宏或“导入的目标”供您使用。CMake对这些文件不执行任何命名约定。通过使用CMake include() 命令，它们与主 Config 文件相关。

trans-unit.source: There may be insufficient space on the target device to accommodate all of the build products.
trans-unit.target: 目标设备上的空间可能不足以容纳所有的构建产品。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the weighted time summary for each label or subproject represents the amount of time that CTest gave to run the tests for each label or subproject and gives a good representation of the total expense of the tests for each label or subproject when compared to other labels or subprojects.
trans-unit.target: 因此,每个标签或子项目的加权时间汇总代表了CTest为运行每个标签或子项目的测试所付出的时间,与其他标签或子项目相比,很好地体现了每个标签或子项目的测试总费用。

trans-unit.source: These generators prefer to lookup the build tool at build time rather than to store CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM in the CMake cache ahead of time. This is because the tools are version-specific and can be located using the Windows Registry. It is also necessary because the proper build tool may depend on the project content (e.g. the Intel Fortran plugin to VS 10 and 11 requires devenv.com to build its .vfproj project files even though MSBuild.exe is normally preferred to support the CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET).
trans-unit.target: 这些生成器更喜欢在构建时查找构建工具，而不是提前将 CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM 存储在CMake缓存中。这是因为这些工具是特定于版本的，可以使用Windows注册表进行定位。这也是必要的，因为正确的构建工具可能取决于项目的内容（例如，VS 10和11的Intel Fortran插件需要 devenv.com 来构建其 .vfproj 项目文件，即使通常首选 MSBuild.exe 来支持 CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET ） 。

trans-unit.source: These generators store CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM in the CMake cache so that it may be edited by the user.
trans-unit.target: 这些生成器将 CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM 存储在CMake缓存中，以便用户可以对其进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: These generators support Integrated Development Environment (IDE) project files. Since the IDEs configure their own environment one may launch CMake from any environment.
trans-unit.target: 这些生成器支持集成开发环境(IDE)项目文件。由于IDE配置了自己的环境,人们可以从任何环境中启动CMake。

trans-unit.source: These generators support command-line build tools. In order to use them, one must launch CMake from a command-line prompt whose environment is already configured for the chosen compiler and build tool.
trans-unit.target: 这些生成器支持命令行构建工具。为了使用它们,必须从命令行提示符中启动CMake,其环境已经为所选的编译器和构建工具配置好了。

trans-unit.source: These options are used for both normal linking and device linking (see policy CMP0105). To control link options for normal and device link steps, $<HOST_LINK> and $<DEVICE_LINK>generator expressions can be used.
trans-unit.target: 这些选项用于正常链接和设备链接（请参阅策略 CMP0105 ）。要控制正常和设备链接步骤的链接选项，可以使用 $<HOST_LINK> 和 $<DEVICE_LINK> generator expressions 。

trans-unit.source: These paths are implicit linker framework search directories for the compiler’s language. CMake automatically detects these directories for each language and reports the results in this variable.
trans-unit.target: 这些路径是编译器语言的隐式链接程序框架搜索目录。CMake自动为每种语言检测这些目录，并在此变量中报告结果。

trans-unit.source: These variables are especially useful when cross-compiling to point to the root directory of the target environment and CMake will search there too. By default at first the directories listed in CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH are searched, then the CMAKE_SYSROOT directory is searched, and then the non-rooted directories will be searched. The default behavior can be adjusted by setting CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_MODE_INCLUDE. This behavior can be manually overridden on a per-call basis using options:
trans-unit.target: 当交叉编译指向目标环境的根目录时，这些变量特别有用，CMake也会在该目录中搜索。默认情况下，首先搜索 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 中列出的目录，然后搜索 CMAKE_SYSROOT 目录，然后搜索非根目录。可以通过设置 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_MODE_INCLUDE 来调整默认行为。可以使用选项在每个呼叫的基础上手动覆盖此行为：

trans-unit.target: 此字符串属性，包含用分号分隔的目录路径。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性将由 CMAKE_ANDROID_JAR_DIRECTORIES 变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: This abstracts a native build tool’s command-line interface with the following options:

trans-unit.source: This allows to add individual build events for every configuration.
trans-unit.target: 这允许为每个配置添加单独的构建事件。

trans-unit.source: This also applies to paths referencing external dependencies. It is not advisable to populate any properties which may contain paths, such as INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES or INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES, with paths relevant to dependencies. For example, this code may not work well for a relocatable package:
